title: El audio de Youtube se reproduce con mucha latencia
content: Tengo unos auriculares nuevos (JBL Quantum 300) me va bien en lo general, pero cuando reproduzco un video de Youtube todo va bien hasta que le doy a las flechitas direccionales para avanzar o atrasar el video, cuando hago esto el video sigue reproduciendo perfectamente pero el audio tarda unos segundos en volver, por lo que se hace incomodo adelantar y atrasar el video, ya que hay un periodo de tiempo en el que se ve el video pero no se escucha. Este problema se soluciona cuando abro el software de los auriculares, o, por lo contrario, y la solucion mas extraña, cuando dejo un video abierto en pausa en otra pestaña. Por lo que he podido comprobar no es problema de los cascos, ya que no me pasa cuando reproduzco videos en youtube desde otros navegadores, lo he probado en microsoft edge y el audio va a la perfeccion con el video. Muchas gracias de antemano!
creator: lucasrealejos

title: My Firefox Web Browser keeps crashing every page and every tab
content:
My Firefox Web Browser has been consistently every day crashing regardless of how many pages or tabs have been open. Regardless if I'm actively using Firefox when it crashes or leaving it up to do something on my phone. These crashes started shortly after Firefox had that major structural update, but recently Windows 10 had an update it forced me into. I don't know if either is the cause. What happens before crashing is the page goes either all black or all white and then all tabs are gone. This wouldn't bother me so much if Firefox crashing didn't interfere with my AdBlocker and make me reload everything for AdBlocker. I have tried updating Firefox and troubleshooting Firefox and not opening so many tabs -- and nothing helps. I want Firefox to stop crashing and find out what the problem is. Please help!

This is what I have for the long Report ID number(s:): bp-fd4ea624-e71b-4d83-9dc5-4068c0210622 6/22/2021, 5:15 AM bp-ca2334c1-ac45-4c10-bcd5-eca360210622 6/22/2021, 5:15 AM bp-189f0e5e-25e6-44dc-bf62-fa0320210622 6/22/2021, 5:15 AM bp-20fdf0ed-dd26-4a5d-b912-7a5010210622 6/22/2021, 5:15 AM bp-e8e1529b-c10a-47b9-844f-6d5d20210622 6/22/2021, 5:15 AM bp-ce5a0e39-4c4c-465e-b85d-c88fa0210622 6/22/2021, 5:15 AM bp-f653c127-b5dc-44e2-b13a-b11c70210622 6/22/2021, 5:15 AM bp-ed4f9869-7069-45ed-9ce4-a560e0210622 6/22/2021, 5:15 AM bp-12ea0d64-1640-4eab-b0cc-3cad90210622 6/22/2021, 5:15 AM bp-bc9b7bcb-a06c-4a53-8ed8-22fb80210622 6/22/2021, 5:15 AM

title: Не работают локальные сертификаты безопасности
content:
Перестали работать сертификаты безопасности. Опция "Запрашивать у OCSP-серверов подтверждение текущего статуса сертификатов" включена, сертификаты установлены, действуют до 2030 года. Запроса при открытии сайтов не происходит. Ранее помогало удаление сохраненных данных (например zabbix.yarteleservice.ru и тп), после чего выходил запрос на сертификат, при этом если сертификат был выбран не верно, либо был отказ - повторного запроса не было, даже после перезапуска браузера. На днях браузер обновился, и теперь я никак не могу запустить свои ресурсы, требующие локальных сертификатов. Страницы выдают одно и то же сообщение:

Ошибка при установлении защищённого соединения При соединении с noc.yarteleservice.ru произошла ошибка. PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR Страница, которую вы пытаетесь просмотреть, не может быть отображена, так как достоверность полученных данных не может быть проверена."

Как мне вернуть запросы сертификатов?
creator: fasinfo

title: Uusi Firefox Versio
content:
Eli Firefoxin uudesta versiosta.

Tykkään että selain on oman näköinen, ja uudessa versiossa fontit ei toimi kuten tykkään. Käytän .reg asenusta joka muokkaa tiettyjä Windowsin fontteja sillain että esimerkiksi kansiot pikakuvakkeet jne. ovat halutun fontin muotoisia. Uudessa Firefoxin päivityksessä tämä ei toimi enkä saa itse Firefoxin asetuksista muokattua uutta versiota toimimaan kuten on toiminut.

Reg tiedosto on siis. Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Fonts] "Segoe UI (TrueType)"="" "Segoe UI Bold (TrueType)"="" "Segoe UI Bold Italic (TrueType)"="" "Segoe UI Italic (TrueType)"="" "Segoe UI Light (TrueType)"="" "Segoe UI Semibold (TrueType)"="" "Segoe UI Symbol (TrueType)"=""

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\FontSubstitutes]

"Segoe UI"="Kristen ITC"

Tämä muuttaa esimerkiksi Firefoxin hakukentään tulevan tekstin Kristen ITC, mutta sivustot jotka avaan ovat ihan normaalilla teksillä. Esim Facebookkia selatessa vastaan tulevan Uutisen otsikko on valitsemallani Fontilla mutta kun avaan uutisen, uutinen vaihtuu normaalille fontille. Olen koittanut uuden päivityksen jälkeen Firefoxin asetuksista tehdä samaa mutta tämä ei onnistu sitten millään. Mikä avuksi ? Päivitin selaimen vanhempaan versioon ja kaikissa aikasemmissa versioissa tämä mieleiseni Fontti ja .reg tiedosto on toiminut samanlailla.
creator: paripelikaljaa

title: How to unblock facebook comments plugin on FF 89?
content:
Some websites have this text box under their articles to write a comment and post it on Facebook (see the screenshot). But for that to happen, first you must login to your Facebook account. The problem is that when I click the button "login to post", nothing happens - as if I didn't click it at all. I suspect the reason for that are the integrated anti-tracking options in Firefox 89. So the question is: how do I get this plugin to work in Firefox 89?

P.S. Until a month ago I was temporarily using Chromium as default browser and there the FB plugin had no issues. Chromium has no anti-tracking options which is why I think this function in Firefox is the reason for the FB plugin not to work.

title: Having All Sorts Of Problems With Latest FFox
content:
Sometimes my computer crashes after starting Firefox for the first time each day. Once the restart completes I don't have problems for the rest of the day.

In Facebook I find I suddenly can't attach image or links to a post. I remove them and the post button becomes active again but even if I try to edit the post after with an attachment the button is blue but is not clickable. When I go to another browser everything works just fine.

One dashboard I use for my business now loads without any content on the page but it loads perfectly fine in another browser. All of these problems started with this newer version of Firefox.

Is there some setting I need to adjust, should I roll back or is it time to move on?
